Our 5 Rated Yoga Teacher Training Course

Our courses

Yoga Alliance Certified YTTC

Being a Yoga Alliance USA Certified Yoga School, Maharishi Yoga Peeth Offers 200, 300 & 500 Hour Yoga Teacher Training in Rishikesh, India. Students who pass out from Maharishi Yoga Peeth are Awarded with a Certificate which is Valid and Accepted Internationally!

What You Will Gain

  • Learn to practice yoga beyond the mat
  • Learn to practice & teach over 170 Hatha Yoga poses
  • Establish structure and habits for a healthy body and mind
  • Learn to teach others with professional standards
  • Experience authentic yogic lifestyle with a like-minded community
  • Get a deep understanding of yoga philosophy and practice
  • Reach a new level in your personal yoga and meditation practice
  • Receive your worldwide Yoga Alliance accredited Yoga instructor certification

200 Hour Yoga
Teacher Training
Course in Rishikesh

Our 200 Hour Multi-style Yoga Teacher Training in Rishikesh is for those who would like to strengthen their practice in Hatha, Ashtanga and Vinyasa Yoga. This course is well designed to meet the needs of Beginner and Intermediate level yoga practitioners. The intensity of teaching increases each week as you go through the program.

More Info

300 Hour Yoga
Teacher Training
Course in Rishikesh

Our 300 hour yoga teachers training course is for those who have already completed 200-hour YTTC and are looking forward to enhance their teaching skills or who wish to enrich their practical or theoretical knowledge or the best way for reintroduction to yoga teaching. This course is specifically designed for intermediate to advanced level yoga practitioners.

More Info

500 Hour Yoga
Teacher Training
Course in Rishikesh

Our 500 Hour Yoga Teacher Training course will develop yoga teaching abilities, professional skills and complement yourself in this yogic journey by evolving physically and spiritually. 500 hour Yoga teachers training course is a combination of 200 hour YTTC and 300 hour YTTC and covers the full spectrum of US yoga alliance certified training in one go.

More Info

Yoga Courses in Rishikesh

Why we are

Why Our Teacher Training Course?

  • learn and develop the skills

    At Maharishi Yoga Peeth in Rishikesh, you learn and develop the skills to teach yoga asana, gain sound knowledge about the classical yoga tradition, and at the same time deepen your spiritual practice and renew yourself with profound inner transformation. This yoga teacher training course will help you to inculcate and establish a firm foundation of discipline that promotes physical, mental, emotional, and spiritual growth. This yoga course will build a strong base to teach others naturally and with confidence.

  • Yoga teaching lineage

    Maharishi Yoga Peeth in Rishikesh offers 200 Hour yoga Teacher Training, 300 Hour yoga Teacher Training & 500 Hour yoga Teacher Training Intensive Residential Courses. Our students live in a traditional Gurukul yoga ashram where they get to closely interact with our experienced and dedicated yoga teachers and staff who themselves are immersed in the yogic lifestyle. Based on the ancient yoga teaching lineage of Guru-Sishya Sampradaya â€“ passed down from yoga guru to disciple through thousands of years our curriculum is extensive and covers both yoga theory and practical sessions.

  • US yoga alliance certificate

    Ayurvedic vegetarian diet, daily practice of yoga, whilst living amidst nature promotes a very conducive learning environment for serious yoga practitioners. Graduates from our Yoga Teacher Training school in Rishikesh receive internationally recognized US Yoga Alliance certificate.

Our Facilities

Apply Now

Ashram

We are Located in the Centre of Rishikesh, which is the Yoga Capital of The World. Maharishi Yoga Peeth is a Place to Relax, Rejuvenate and Re-Balance. It is an Amalgamation of Serene Spiritual Yoga Ashram Environment with a Professional Training Institutional Approach. We Strive to Keep the Energy of the Ashram Pure and Untainted so that the Training Practice Brings about Spiritual Transformation. Therefore, Try to Come with an Open Mind, Soft Heart and a Strong Spine.

Yoga Shala

Our Spacious Well Ventilated Yoga Shala Has a 360Â° Forest Moutain View, with Ample Natural Light and Fresh Air. It is Fully Equipped with all Necessary Yoga Accessories and Props, Smart Classroom Facilities for Lectures and a Small Library for the Bookworms.

Accommodation

  • Our Boarding Facility is Completely Safe for Everyone. The Rooms are Clean and Spacious with Ensuite Washrooms and 24/7 Hot Water Facility.
  • All Rooms have a Beautiful Mountain Or Ganga View.
  • We can Accommodate you a Day Prior to The Start of The Program. If You are Arriving Earlier, You will Have to Manage Your Own Accommodation, Else we will Provide Stay at an Additional Cost.
  • Program Fees Includes Accommodations on Single/Double/Triple Sharing Basis.

Food

  • At Maharishi Yoga Peeth, We Strictly Follow Vegetarian Diet. Food will be Provided Thrice a Day (Breakfast, Lunch and Dinner) with special Herbal Tea. The Food Provided at the Ashram is Delicious â€“ Ayurvedic Meals. However, We do Try our Best to Accommodate Special Food Requirements Such as Lactose Intolerant or Gluten Intolerant.
  • The Food We Consume is Very Significant in The Yoga Practice. Therefore, We Make a Conscious Effort in Acquiring Organically Grown Fruits and Vegetables. It is also Important How the Food is Prepared. The Mind of Chef in the Preparation of the Food has an Impact on The Quality of Food Cooked and Served. Even the Process of Food Consumption has an Immense Impact on the Yoga Practice.
  • Considering all the Aspects, We have Been Making Conscious Efforts in Offering Food as a Sacred Process of Enhancing Yoga Practice

Transportation

  • Free Airport PickUp !!
  • Send us Your Travel Details, Such as Flight Number, Terminal Number, Date and Time of Your Arrival from Dehradun (DED) Airport/ Train or Bus Number Arriving at Rishikesh Railway or Bus Station.
  • We ProvideAround the Clock Airport/Railway Station/Bus Station Pick-Up Facility for Every Individual Student Totally Free of Cost.
  • Drop Off can be Arranged for the Student on Request at an Actual Cost.

Other

  • Free Wi-Fi
  • Free Herbal Tea
  • Free Ayurvedic Massage
  • Reverse Osmosis Drinking Water
  • Laundry Service (Additional Cost)
  • 24 Hours Hot Water Supply
  • Room Heaters (On Request)

Frequently Asked Questions

How long should you do yoga before starting yoga teacher training ?

Ideally, you should have already attended a few yoga classes before starting your yoga teacher training. We encourage you to focus on completing your training. Western yoga is very different from traditional yoga. Our classes build slowly so you can learn all about asanas, pranayama, meditation, and more, from beginner to advanced.

Which yoga style do you teach?
